title: What We've Been Watching - Kinda Funny Screencast
description:
Head over to Kindafunny.com/DragonAge to listen and subscribe to Dragon Age: Vows & Vengeance!

This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10% off your first month.

Tim and Joey talk all about Trap, IF, Didi, Only Murders in the Building, English Teacher, House of the Dragon, and more!

Time Stamps -

00:03:30 - Housekeeping

00:09:05 - IF
00:14:10 - Didi
00:17:35 - Only Murders in the Building Season 4
00:24:29  - English Teacher Season 1

00:32:20 - True Blood

00:36:10 - Why Women Kill
00:40:25 - The Bikeriders
00:43:30 - Gilmore Girls
